text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.title: Axes Are Weapons
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.en: Enable Fire Aspect for Axes (via Anvil)
Enable modded Sword Enchantments for Axes (via Anvil)
Enable the above in the Enchanting Table too
Otherwise books have to be used
Enable Damage Enchantments for Axes in the Enchanting Table
Namely: Sharpness, Smite and Bane of the Bane of Arthropods
(These can always be added via books)
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.al: Make Silk Touch and Looting compatible
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.en: Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
Once on an axe, the enchantment will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
text.autoconfig.axesareweapons.option.al: Once on an axe, the enchantments will stay
on there, even if the option is disabled
The long-awaited sequel to this mod
(This will enable all the above options for Pickaxes, Shovels and Hoes too)
